s1.title: Mailing List directions
s1.p: General information about the jakarta mailing lists can be found here. Please read these guidelines before subscribing or posting to the lists.

To subscribe to the user list, send an empty message to
cactus-user-subscribe@jakarta.apache.org.

Once you're subscribed, send mail to
cactus-user@jakarta.apache.org to post messages on the user list.

All mail sent to cactus-user@jakarta.apache.org is archived
here.
s1.note: The same applies for the dev mailing list; replace "user" by "dev".

The creation of the Cactus dev mailing-list happened on the 15th of September 2001. Pior to that date dev messages were posted to the cactus-user mailing-list (and even for some time after that date!).

The creation of the Cactus user mailing list happened on the 5th of July 2001. Prior to that date all messages were posted on the jakarta-commons mailing list (and even for some time after that date!). You can check the archives of jakarta-commons
here.
